title: ABR 1770 Demo
description:
What is the best was to keep cool refreshments close by?
Check out the ABR-1770 Beverage Cooler from Newair.

The first thing you should know about, are the dimensions. This unit is: 
23.4 inches wide, 
33 inches tall, and 
22.4 inches deep. 

It was designed that way to be the same size as a kitchen trash compactor, so you can easily switch them out.

Most people these days are getting grid of their outdated compactors because the convenience of the foot-pedal or touch free trash cans, and also for how well they stay sealed against odors. Recycling, and composting have also taken over for bettering the environment, rather than just trying to cut down on the volume on landfills; which mostly have their own compactors anyway.

The ABR-1770 is a modern update that fits nicely into those spaces. A pretty easy switch for people who decide the compactor was good in it’s time, but it’s time to live a little nicer.

This unit is 33.9 inches tall to fit right under your countertop. It has a front venting compressor so it doesn’t need to have ventilation. But it can also be free-standing; you can set it up in the game room if you want.

It has a 96 can holding capacity, or you can adjust the shelves for bottles to cool your craft brews to perfection. It has thick insulation, a double pane glass door that’s reversible, so you can set it up to open either way. And there’s a security lock if you have little kids, or want to keep unwanted customers out.

Watch the video to learn more about the ABR-1770 Beverage Cooler from Newair.

transcripts: Hi I'm Ian and we're taking a look at the ABR 1770 beverage cooler from NewAir. First thing you should know about are the dimensions the unit is 23.4 inches wide 33 inches tall and 22.4 inches deep it was designed that way to be the same size as a kitchen trash compactor so you can easily switch them out. The ABR 1770 is a modern update that fits nicely into those spaces, a pretty easy switch for someone who decides now the compactor was great it's time but time to live a little nicer. The unit of 33 inches tall to fit right on your countertop it has a front bending compressing so it doesn't need to have ventilation but it can also be freestanding you can set it up in the game room if you want. It has easy to use digital controls and a display that's easy to read. It has a 177 can holding capacity or you can adjust the shelves for bottles to cool your craft brews to perfection. It has thick insulation a double pane glass door that's reversible you can set it up to open either way also there's a security lock if you have little kids or want to keep unwanted customers out. Thanks for taking a look with me at the ABR 1770 beverage cooler from NewAir. At NewAir trust is important to us we test each product line before we put it on the market to make sure it's reliable we have a world-class dependable dedicated customer service team so your calls and emails go to real people and we've been doing this since 2002 so we've built a reputation as one of the best customer review companies online. That's why NewAir is a name you can trust.
